question: Akhilesh Das Gupta, the former Union Minister has passed away. He was associated with which political party?
explanation: Dr Akhilesh Das Gupta (56), the former Union Minister of State for Steel under Dr. Manmohan Singh Government during UPA-I, has recently passed away in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh.  He was a Prominent Educationist, Professor, and Indian Politician & Philanthropist. Dr. Gupta was the President of Badminton Association of India (BAI), Vice President of Badminton Asia Confederation (BAC), Member - Executive Council of Badminton World Federation (BWF) & Vice President of Indian Olympic Association (IOA).  He was also the member of the Rajya Sabha for three terms from 1996 to 2014.  Dr. Gupta was the son of Freedom Fighter Late Shri Babu Banarasi Das, the former Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh.
